original_text: Then lie down on your left side. Show that you are receiving the punishment for the sins of the Israelites. You will suffer like that for 390 days. It will show the number of years that I have decided to punish Israel's people. Each day that you suffer will show one year of their punishment.
korean_text: 내가 그들의 범죄한 햇수대로 네게 날수를 정하였나니 곧 삼백구십 일이니라 너는 이렇게 이스라엘 족속의 죄악을 담당하고

sentences.original_text: Then lie down on your left side.
Show that you are receiving the punishment
for the sins of the Israelites.
You will suffer like that for 390 days.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그렇게 390일 동안 고난을 받을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: It will show the number of years
that I have decided to punish Israel's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이스라엘 백성을 벌하기로 결정한 연수다.

sentences.original_text: will show one year of their punishment.
